description: Describes the user activities in a specified time period.

nested_items.name: UserActivities
nested_items.description: The list of activities for the specified user and time period.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The activity type.

nested_items.name: TimeStamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the action was performed.

nested_items.name: IsIndirectActivity
nested_items.description: Indicates whether an activity is indirect or direct. An indirect activity results from a direct activity performed on a parent resource. For example, sharing a parent folder (the direct activity) shares all of the subfolders and documents within the parent folder (the indirect activity).

nested_items.name: OrganizationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the organization.

nested_items.name: Initiator
nested_items.description: The user who performed the action.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the user.

nested_items.name: Username
nested_items.description: The name of the user.

nested_items.name: GivenName
nested_items.description: The given name of the user before a rename operation.

nested_items.name: Surname
nested_items.description: The surname of the user.

nested_items.name: EmailAddress
nested_items.description: The email address of the user.

nested_items.name: Participants
nested_items.description: The list of users or groups impacted by this action. This is an optional field and is filled for the following sharing activities: DOCUMENT_SHARED, DOCUMENT_SHARED, DOCUMENT_UNSHARED, FOLDER_SHARED, FOLDER_UNSHARED.

nested_items.name: Users
nested_items.description: The list of users.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the user.

nested_items.name: Username
nested_items.description: The name of the user.

nested_items.name: GivenName
nested_items.description: The given name of the user before a rename operation.

nested_items.name: Surname
nested_items.description: The surname of the user.

nested_items.name: EmailAddress
nested_items.description: The email address of the user.

nested_items.name: Groups
nested_items.description: The list of user groups.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the user group.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the group.

nested_items.name: ResourceMetadata
nested_items.description: The metadata of the resource involved in the user action.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of resource.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the resource.

nested_items.name: OriginalName
nested_items.description: The original name of the resource before a rename operation.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource.

nested_items.name: VersionId
nested_items.description: The version ID of the resource. This is an optional field and is filled for action on document version.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the user.

nested_items.name: Username
nested_items.description: The name of the user.

nested_items.name: GivenName
nested_items.description: The given name of the user before a rename operation.

nested_items.name: Surname
nested_items.description: The surname of the user.

nested_items.name: EmailAddress
nested_items.description: The email address of the user.

nested_items.name: ParentId
nested_items.description: The parent ID of the resource before a rename operation.

nested_items.name: OriginalParent
nested_items.description: The original parent of the resource. This is an optional field and is filled for move activities.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of resource.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the resource.

nested_items.name: OriginalName
nested_items.description: The original name of the resource before a rename operation.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource.

nested_items.name: VersionId
nested_items.description: The version ID of the resource. This is an optional field and is filled for action on document version.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the user.

nested_items.name: Username
nested_items.description: The name of the user.

nested_items.name: GivenName
nested_items.description: The given name of the user before a rename operation.

nested_items.name: Surname
nested_items.description: The surname of the user.

nested_items.name: EmailAddress
nested_items.description: The email address of the user.

nested_items.name: ParentId
nested_items.description: The parent ID of the resource before a rename operation.

nested_items.name: CommentMetadata
nested_items.description: Metadata of the commenting activity. This is an optional field and is filled for commenting activities.

nested_items.name: CommentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the comment.

nested_items.name: Contributor
nested_items.description: The user who made the comment.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the user.

nested_items.name: Username
nested_items.description: The login name of the user.

nested_items.name: EmailAddress
nested_items.description: The email address of the user.

nested_items.name: GivenName
nested_items.description: The given name of the user.

nested_items.name: Surname
nested_items.description: The surname of the user.

nested_items.name: OrganizationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the organization.

nested_items.name: RootFolderId
nested_items.description: The ID of the root folder.

nested_items.name: RecycleBinFolderId
nested_items.description: The ID of the recycle bin folder.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the user.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of user.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the user was created.

nested_items.name: ModifiedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the user was modified.

nested_items.name: TimeZoneId
nested_items.description: The time zone ID of the user.

nested_items.name: Locale
nested_items.description: The locale of the user.

nested_items.name: StorageUtilizedInBytes
nested_items.description: The amount of storage used, in bytes.

nested_items.name: StorageRule
nested_items.description: The storage for a user.

nested_items.name: StorageAllocatedInBytes
nested_items.description: The amount of storage allocated, in bytes.

nested_items.name: StorageType
nested_items.description: The type of storage.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp that the comment was created.

nested_items.name: CommentStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the comment.

nested_items.name: RecipientId
nested_items.description: The ID of the user being replied to.

nested_items.name: ContributorId
nested_items.description: The ID of the user who made the comment.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: The marker for the next set of results.
